description: Vendetta gave up height and over 24 pounds, in this welterweight battle. The Black Widow fought hard, but was out-wrestled by the amazing Vendetta. During the match Vendetta made the proud Widow submit five times, as Vendetta's legs and killer holds were too much for the Widow to handle. We had a great RD 4 as Vendetta fucks the shit out of the Widow, then gets Sydnee to lick her to orgasm; it is good to be the winner.
title: Vendetta (Lifetime 2-2) vs
